description: This is an advanced course in the area of political thought. The topic, a detailed study of either major works or themes in political philosophy, varies with each offering. Prerequisites: PSCI 220 and one course in the subfield, or permission of instructor.
name: Sem: Studies Pol Thought
notes: Open only to seniors during web registration. Juniors may add on a space-
available basis during the drop/add period.
prerequisites: Prerequisites: PSCI 220 and one course in the subfield, or permission of instructor.
title: Seminar in Political Theory
